Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

Class TestCacheOnWrite

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.TestCacheOnWrite
public class TestCacheOnWrite extends Object
Tests HFile cache-on-write functionality for the following block types: data blocks, non-root index blocks, and Bloom filter blocks.
